tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Zday 2012 NYC Bakari A. Pace Into to a Resource Based Economy
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Rachel Gholston, Host Z-Day NYC 2012 was held at the Epifaneo Cafe. The event showcased members giving lectures, talks, and performances for entertainment.
www.zeitgeist-ny.com http://www.facebook.com/groups/Znewyork/ www.thezeitgeistmovement.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Did not mean for the debate to take place on YT, simply to have the debate played on TZM after the debate. None of the rational that either PJ or Jaque holds any water, and I mean none of it, quite simply their is nothing to lose by TZM regrouping to support such an idea. The ideas of how a collapse might or when one would happen vary by as many people who believe in such a thing. But several things are certain. The rich will prosper from it just as they have in the past and﻿ the poor will

@screenflicker1 Without great ideas there is no great change, otherwise we would be still in caves, eating raw meat all satisfied with our way of life. People who think they can change the world to be a better and peaceful place usually are the ones to do it..obviously you're not the﻿ one.
TZM recognizes that the system will make itself﻿ obsolete over time.

I'm still not﻿ hearing any of your concrete, detailed suggestions. But, as I said first, go to the TZM forum if you want to try and convince someone, or to get more info. I didn't mean that you should debate on YT, but that's what you're doing now, and I'll stop the conversation here.

You really think time is on humanity's side. Please spend some more time to educate yourself on the reality of the times we live in, and know that the ruling class is﻿ well aware of the reality. And is in pretty good shape to deal with any potential outcome. TZM is becoming a tragedy not being able to evolve. Such a waste.

The RBE model is about enhancing all kinds of potentials people possess, everyone ought to feel important within a socio-economic system. In an RBE system the military and police would be problem solvers, trying to bridge the differences between people and cultures. I'd rather keep both of them but with preferable with new names and functions, until the stage where it is so obvious that people regard it part﻿ of "human nature" and is no longer needed. It is NOT utopia since it is not perfect.
I agree, not many﻿ people realize that. I guess, I was being a bit ignorant in how i was placing my words.
I think I remember watching this guy's videos just after the TZM got﻿ started, though my memory is not so great

I am well aware of the situation and the fact is that even the ruling class doesn't have devastation in their interest - to think otherwise shows a lack of understanding of basic human nature. Yes they are greedy, but such extremes are not in their interest. This is how it can play out: The economy starts to collapse. People suffer, but governments start to compensate for this. They even start switching to renewable energy sources to sustain﻿ the system a bit longer, but it still withers away.

There are too many random youtubers that'd like a shot at PJ, you'd need to make a name for yourself first I guess. Also, PJ has debated many people opposing his ideas, and has said a lot on the subject already (many podcasts for one thing). If you have something productive to say, I'm﻿ sure you can get a decent debate going on the TZM forums. Youtube is just not the place for a proper debate.

Am wiloling to debate Peter Joseph or any member of TZM on the merit of supporting ideas as a group to make this system obsolete. Especially the idea of building off grid communities. And would like to see the debate posted on the TZM channel. Any takers? Or just﻿ more people that want to stick their head in the sand. And be at the mercy of what ever comes.

We may not need the military but a "defense organized group" will be needed if anything negative happens regardless. Not saying cops, but people who dedicate them self's to protecting the public from any potential negative/ hostile scenarios if were to ever happen. I guess, you can call them body guards for civilians(?) lol but i bet TZM has﻿ these ideas in mind.
If TZM does not reorganize itself to support real plans to make this system obsolete. It will go﻿ no where.

What people don't realize is that cops are actually all purpose problem solvers in our society. They facilitate dealing with problems ranging from traffic accidents to family arguments to house fires. It's not all about fights and rioting etc.
IMO it takes a certain amount of experience working within the public safety community and seeing how different scenarios play out to truly be effective in your role as a cop, firefighter or paramedic. You don't come out of academy﻿ plug and play.

It can unfold a 1000 different ways. You need to understand that governments to this day are still the number one leading cause of death. Estimated 220 million in the past 100 years. Remember the movie the Matrix. We are willing to accept a high number of losses. Paraphrase, but hopefully you get the idea. I see we are heading into the perfect storm, TZM people are﻿ no better than any other educational group that has been around for 2000 years. Evolve or die TZM I say evolve.

Yeah, the comments are too short to elaborate too much (or number all the ways it can unfold). I get what you're saying, I just don't agree. Governments aren't inherently﻿ evil either. The sole purpose of TZM is to prepare people for a new way of thinking that will be crucial when the current system collapses. If the movement reaches critical mass, it will collapse even sooner. For the sake of argument, what would you have TZM do? How would you have it evolve?
